mdRecord.dcterms:title: Patient Record for Smith, Franklin
mdRecord.dcterms:spatial: Roane Co., W VA [Roane County, West Virginia]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Smith, Franklin Patient Age: 28. Marital Status: Married. Diagnosis: Chronic diarrhoea [diarrhea] and inflammation of periosteum of left tibia lower third. Result: Cured and returned to duty.
